projects.title: The Harmonic Memory
projects.description: Harmory is a Knowledge Graph of interconnected harmonic patterns aimed to support creative applications in a fully transparent, accountable, and musically plausible way.

projects.title: The Chord Corpus
projects.description: ChoCo provides 20K+ timed chord annotations of scores and tracks, that were integrated, standardised, and semantically enriched from a number of repositories and databases, for a variety of genres and styles

projects.title: Local Harmonic Agreement based on Recurrent Patterns
projects.description: LHARP is a method for harmonic similarity that emphasises shared repeated patterns among symbolic chord sequences, to accommodate a wide set of applications.
